p: Regarding the antiseptic activities, the best antibacterial activity of R. chalepensis essential oil against E. coli, P. aeruginosa, S. aureus, and MRSA was for the essential oil obtained from the plant from the Jerusalem region followed by the essential oil obtained from Hebron region which had MIC values of 1.5 mg/ml, 9 mg/ml, 3.25 mg/ml, and 8 mg/ml, respectively.
